@FieldsMethodsAndParametersAreNonNullByDefault

Package com.uber.autodispose

AutoDispose is an RxJava 2 tool for automatically binding the execution of RxJava 2 streams to a provided scope via disposal/cancellation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AutoDispose.ScopeHandler
    The intermediary return type of the with(...) factories in AutoDispose.
    CompletableSubscribeProxy
    Subscribe proxy that matches Completable's subscribe overloads.
    FlowableSubscribeProxy<T>
    Subscribe proxy that matches Flowable's subscribe overloads.
    LifecycleScopeProvider<E>
    An interface that, when implemented, provides information to AutoDispose to allow it to resolve the next lifecycle event and construct a Maybe representation of it from the LifecycleScopeProvider.lifecycle() stream.
    MaybeSubscribeProxy<T>
    Subscribe proxy that matches Maybe's subscribe overloads.
    ObservableSubscribeProxy<T>
    Subscribe proxy that matches Observable's subscribe overloads.
    ScopeProvider
    Proves a Maybe representation of a scope.
    SingleSubscribeProxy<T>
    Subscribe proxy that matches Single's subscribe overloads.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoDispose
    Factories for autodispose transformation Functions that can be used with RxJava types' corresponding to(...) methods to transform them into auto-disposing streams.
    AutoDisposePlugins
    Utility class to inject handlers to certain standard AutoDispose operations.
    CompletableScoper Deprecated
    Use the static factories in AutoDispose.
    FlowableScoper<T> Deprecated
    Use the static factories in AutoDispose.
    MaybeScoper<T> Deprecated
    Use the static factories in AutoDispose.
    ObservableScoper<T> Deprecated
    Use the static factories in AutoDispose.
    ScopeUtil
    Utilities for dealing with scopes, usually for providers.
    SingleScoper<T> Deprecated
    Use the static factories in AutoDispose.
    TestLifecycleScopeProvider
    Test utility to create LifecycleScopeProvider instances for tests.
    TestScopeProvider
    ScopeProvider implementation for testing.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ScopeUtil.LifecycleEndNotification
    A simple instance enum used to signify that the end of a lifecycle has occurred.
    TestLifecycleScopeProvider.TestLifecycle  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    LifecycleEndedException
    Signifies an error occurred due to execution starting after the lifecycle has ended.
    LifecycleNotStartedException
    Signifies an error occurred due to execution starting before the lifecycle has started.
    OutsideLifecycleException
    Signifies an error occurred due to execution starting outside the lifecycle.

Package com.uber.autodispose Description

AutoDispose is an RxJava 2 tool for automatically binding the execution of RxJava 2 streams to a provided scope via disposal/cancellation.
